articles.title: Kevin O'Leary Warns $2,000 Cheques In 'Trump Accounts' Could Send Inflation Back To 9%: 'Terrible Idea'
articles.mainIdea: Kevin O'Leary Warns $2,000 Cheques In 'Trump Accounts' Could Send Inflation Back To 9%: 'Terrible Idea'
articles.summary: Benzinga: Kevin O'Leary Warns $2,000 Cheques In 'Trump Accounts' Could Send Inflation Back To 9%: 'Terrible Idea'. “Shark Tank” investor Kevin O'Leary has issued a stark warning regarding the proposed $2,000 “tariff dividend” cheques linked to the new ‘Trump Accounts’ initiative, labeling the concept “helicopter money” that risks reigniting the country’s battle with soaring inflation. Inflation Trap In a video shared by him on X, he reacted to the proposed payouts, arguing that the U.S. economy cannot afford another injection of unearned cash. articles.title: ‘Cover-Up’ Review: Netflix’s Scoop on Seymour Hersh
articles.mainIdea: ‘Cover-Up’ Review: Netflix’s Scoop on Seymour Hersh
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: ‘Cover-Up’ Review: Netflix’s Scoop on Seymour Hersh. Laura Poitras and Mark Obenhaus direct this documentary about the investigative journalist whose work has ranged from the My Lai massacre to abuse at Abu Ghraib.

articles.title: Stocks End Mildly Higher as Bullish Sentiment Continues
articles.mainIdea: Stocks End Mildly Higher as Bullish Sentiment Continues
articles.summary: Barchart: Stocks End Mildly Higher as Bullish Sentiment Continues. The S&P 500 Index ($SPX ) (SPY ) on Wednesday rose +0.32%, the Dow Jones Industrials Index ($DOWI ) (DIA ) rose +0.60%, and the Nasdaq 100 Index ($IUXX ) (QQQ ) rose +0.27%. March E-mini S&P futures (ESH26 ) rose +0.27%, and March E-mini Nasdaq futures (NQH26 ) rose... Related tickers mentioned: ^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC, ^NDX.
